page.title: 16NANNY AND GRANDADS DAY
page.content: Nanny takes a cup of tea upstairs at 6.30 a.m. She and Grandad get up at7.30a.m. After breakfast they feed the dogs, chickens and sometimes they have little pigs to feed. Grandad looks after his garden and greenhouses He waters the plants. Some days he helps Daddy to make rollershutter doors. Nanny goes to Tadcaster to do some shopping . She buys a morning paper, takes it home and does the crossword. She then cleans the house. Very often Nanny's neighbours need taking into work. Then about 4 o'clock Grandad wants to be picked up from Daddy's works. After tea she watches the television and knits.Grandad waters his tomatoes, vegetables and chrysanthemums. They have supper at 8 p.m. and go to bed about 10 p.m.
